title: Playback Time
description: Video/film combination has been done before but not quite like this. A film for all of us who hunger for truth. For all of us who cry out in pain.
quote: What is life but a teardrop in the eye of infinity?
altHero: close-up of Carson Clay with dramatic lighting in a long hallway
alt1: Caron Clay in a suit, walking through an industrial building
alt2: Carson Clay examines a body under a sheet
alt3: Sabine, fancily dressed and holding an umbrella, puts a hand on Carson Clay’s back
alt4: Mr. Bean and Sabine driving in the car
